text: Yu Ishizu is a Japanese archer. He was born on 8 April 1987. Ishizu competed at the 2012 Summer Olympics.Yu IshizuYu ISHIZU In the team competition, Japan won against India in the initial round after a shootout, but then lost to the United States by just one point. As for the individual event, Ishizu was eliminated in the first round, suffering a 7-1 defeat to Simon Terry. == References == Category:Japanese archers Category:Olympians for Japan Category:1987 births Category:Living people
title: Yu Ishizu
